TEXT.TITLE: WATKINS-JOHNSON <WJ> WINS CONTRACT
TEXT.BODY: Watkins-Johnson Co said it received a contract from General Electric COrp's <GE> G.E. Astro Space division for nearly two mln dlrs to provide traveling-wave-tube amplifiers on the Mars Observer spacecraft. The Observer is scheduled to be launched into Mars orbit in the early 1990s. Reuter
